alert.note: Alert for Northern Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 1:16PM MST until January 23 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches above 5500 ft, with 1 to 3 inches below 5500 ft inches. * WHERE...Areas near Payson and Pine-Strawberry. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute Monday. Snow forecast from 11 PM Today to 11 PM Monday: Payson 1 to 3 inches Pine-Strawberry 2 to 4 inches .
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
